## isFunction() function

Returns whether or not the given value is of type `Function`

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function isFunction(o: any): o is Function;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  o | any |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

o is Function
